mdRecord.dcterms:title: Effie Reed's Second Grade School Report Card
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is the Floyd County Public Schools, Aluma Ridge School, Monthly Term and Annual Report Card of Effie Reed for the school year 1929 - 1930. The teacher was Elizabeth Ashworth
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Schools
Report Cards
